title: Shaclone got perma banned.
body:
Because he kept int feeding because of idiots.

I say good riddance, the guys an ass.

replies.body: Agreed, the guy needs the get his head out his ass and look at himself, really disgusting human being.

though to be fair if you were also trying to one-trick to challenger and people kept banning your main champion and bad mouthing you, I'd imagine you'd be quite livid.

I can't say I agree with inting but on the other hand I feel the people who decided to troll him should face some repercussions. However riot won't bother to and honestly I feel what they did was just as bad as what shaclone did. Whilst shaclone probably deserved to be banned, do you really believe that the people who banned his main, knowingly and with malice, are truly innocent?

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BE35L3UT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-30T04:45:16.929+0000)
>
> though to be fair if you were also trying to one-trick to challenger and people kept banning your main champion and bad mouthing you, I'd imagine you'd be quite livid.
> 
> I can't say I agree with inting but on the other hand I feel the people who decided to troll him should face some repercussions. However riot won't bother to and honestly I feel what they did was just as bad as what shaclone did. Whilst shaclone probably deserved to be banned, do you really believe that the people who banned his main, knowingly and with malice, are truly innocent?

hes been inting when he gets shaco too lol, and hes trying way to hard to be a tyler1 hehe xd inter. bout time his washed up irrelevant ass got banned lul
And he was whining about the shaco nerfs so much even though people like Pink Ward have actually just gone and found what works better on shaco since the changes.

to be fair, the style of playing shaco with hydra static ad dps split build that shaclone was famous for was made near impossible to play. Now you are presented with armour pen single target assassin with the new lethality items (new standard build which shaclone can't really play properly and doesn't suit his style), calm patience ap (which pink ward already does far better), tanky splitpush fighter (which verizion has already been doing for far longer and better) or hybrid (which shaclone already stated he doesn't like). Shaclone was the only one who completely lost his niche and also his personality has been getting worse and he seriously needs to find his old chill and find a new way to play if he wants to continue to be a popular youtube shaco main.
How funny, never heard of him.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BE35L3UT,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-30T13:04:43.348+0000)

> and you never will.
